com.romanostrechlis.rssnews.auxiliary

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.romanostrechlis.rssnews.auxiliary.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handles all transaction between the application and the SQLite database.

    There are methods implemented that aren't used by the application. This class is meant to implement additional functionality for the application.

    Methods Implemented and Used.

    • dropRssItemTable(): First drops the RssItem table and then re-creates it.
    • addRssFeed(RssFeed): Adds an RssFeed.
    • addRssItem(RssItem): Adds an RssItem.
    • getAllRssFeed(): Returns the list of all RssFeed objects stored in database.
    • getEnabled(): Returns a list with only the RssFeed objects that have 'true' in enabled column.
    • updateRssFeed(RssFeed): Updates an RssFeed.
    • getRssFeedCount(): Returns the number of RssFeed objects stored in database.
    • getInstance(Context): Returns an instance of DatabaseHandler.
    • getFeedItems(int): Returns all RssItem objects with given parent id.
    Author:
    Romanos Trechlis
